mapper.insert: insert into dispatch_account( id, username, password, email, phone, game_token, session_key, locale, ban_start_time, ban_end_time, ban, create_time, update_time, remarks, ) values ( #{createPlayerId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{token}, #{sessionKey}, #{locale}, #{banStartTime}, #{banEndTime}, #{ban}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, )
